text: Laxmi Narayan Tripathi (born 13 December 1978), known as Laxmi, sometimes written as Lakshmi is a transgender/Hijra rights activist, Bollywood actress, Bharatanatyam dancer, choreographer and motivational speaker in Mumbai, India. She is also the Acharya Mahamandaleshwar of kinnar akhada. She is the first transgender person to represent Asia Pacific in the UN in 2008. == References == == Other websites == * Laxmi's interview on gender and sexuality Category:Transgender women Category:1978 births Category:Indian actors Category:Choreographers Category:Indian dancers
title: Laxmi Tripathi
